column2: Boeing warns of engine icing risk on 747-8s
column3: Dreamliners SEATTLE/TOKYO Boeing  advised airlines on Friday about a risk of engine icing problems on its new 747-8 and 787 Dreamliner planes with engines made by General Electric
column4: urging 15 carriers to avoid flying them near high-level thunderstorms. ~Boeing invites more than a dozen sites to bid on 777 jet work Boeing Co  has invited more than a dozen U.S. locations to compete in a bidding process to determine where its new 777 long-haul passenger jet will be built

column2: UPDATE 1-Microsoft sells over a million Xbox Ones in under 24 hours SAN FRANCISCO
column3: Nov 22 Microsoft Corp  sold over 1 million of its new Xbox One game consoles within 24 hours of their hitting store shelves on Friday
column4: on par with Sony Corp's PlayStation 4 despite launching in far more countries. ~Microsoft sells over 1 mln Xbox One units in less than 24 hours SAN FRANCISCO
column5: Nov 22 Microsoft Corp  said on Friday that it had sold over 1 million units of its new Xbox One gaming console in less than  24 hours after it went on sale in 13 countries. ~
